products.name: Elser AI
products.tagline: Create full anime shorts with just a prompt in minutes
products.description: Elser AI helps creators turn ideas into full anime story videos. Just enter an idea, Elser AI could create long-form videos with consistent characters, clear story flow, and cinematic styles.
products.keywords: Elser AI, Create full anime shorts with just a prompt in minutes

products.name: Lexie
products.tagline: A Tamagotchi that turns language practice into a game
products.description: Meet Lexie: a tamagotchi-inspired game that makes French practice stick – especially the ridiculous bits. It grows when you practice, evolves when you’re right.

products.name: Funding Goal
products.tagline: Calculate how much you should raise and why
products.description: This funding goal calculator helps you figure out how much to raise based on your burn rate, runway, and plans.

products.name: Squair
products.tagline: Calm anxiety in 2 minutes with Navy SEAL breathing
products.description: Squair brings science-backed breathing protocols to your pocket: Box Breathing for stress, Zen Button for panic attacks, 4-7-8 for sleep.

products.name: MTV REWIND
products.tagline: 24/7 music video streaming-MTV when it actually played music
products.description: MTV REWIND brings back the golden era of music television - 35,000 videos spanning 1970-2025 across 8 channels.
